tagline: Answer a few questions and get 3 practical example ideas you can adapt to your life.
yourContextHint: These help tailor the examples. You can skip any.
context_job: Your work/study area (e.g., student, engineer, sales)
context_people: Who is involved? (e.g., partner, boss, parents, friends)
context_place: Where does this happen? (e.g., office, home, online)
context_goal: What do you want to improve? (one sentence)
customizeTip: Tip: Replace the words in [brackets] with details from your own life.
footer: Prototype for GitHub Pages. Data-driven: edit files in /data to add more cases/questions.
